013package org.apache.juneau.bean.swagger;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * The Schema Object allows the definition of input and output data types.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * These types can be objects, but also primitives and arrays.
029 * This object is based on the JSON Schema Specification Draft 4 and uses a predefined subset of it.
030 * On top of this subset, there are extensions provided by this specification to allow for more complete documentation.
031 *
032 * <p>
033 * Further information about the properties can be found in JSON Schema Core and JSON Schema Validation.
034 * Unless stated otherwise, the property definitions follow the JSON Schema specification as referenced here.
035 *
036 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
037 * <p class='bjava'>
038 *    <jc>// Construct using SwaggerBuilder.</jc>
039 *    SchemaInfo <jv>info</jv> = <jsm>schemaInfo</jsm>()
040 *       .type(<js>"string"</js>)
041 *       .title(<js>"foo"</js>)
042 *
043 *    <jc>// Serialize using JsonSerializer.</jc>
044 *    String <jv>json</jv> = JsonSerializer.<jsf>DEFAULT</jsf>.toString(<jv>info</jv>);
045 *
046 *    <jc>// Or just use toString() which does the same as above.</jc>
047 *    <jv>json</jv> = <jv>info</jv>.toString();
048 * </p>
049 * <p class='bjson'>
050 *    <jc>// Output</jc>
051 *    {
052 *       <js>"type"</js>: <js>"string"</js>,
053 *       <js>"title"</js>: <js>"foo"</js>
054 *    }
055 * </p>
056 *
057 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
058 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jrs.Swagger">Overview &gt; juneau-rest-server &gt; Swagger</a>
059 * </ul>
060 */
061@Bean(properties="format,title,description,default,multipleOf,maximum,exclusiveMaximum,minimum,exclusiveMinimum,maxLength,minLength,pattern,maxItems,minItems,uniqueItems,maxProperties,minProperties,required,requiredProperties,enum,type,items,allOf,properties,additionalProperties,discriminator,readOnly,xml,externalDocs,example,$ref,*")
062@FluentSetters
063public class SchemaInfo extends SwaggerElement {
064
065   private String
066      format,
067      title,
068      description,
069      pattern,
070      type,
071      discriminator,
072      ref;
073   private Number
074      multipleOf,
075      maximum,
076      minimum;
077   private Integer
078      maxLength,
079      minLength,
080      maxItems,
081      minItems,
082      maxProperties,
083      minProperties;
084   private Boolean
085      exclusiveMaximum,
086      exclusiveMinimum,
087      uniqueItems,
088      readOnly,
089      required;
090   private Object
091      _default,  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
092      example;
093   private Items items;
094   private Xml xml;
095   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
096   private Set<Object>
097      _enum,  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
098      allOf;
099   private Set<String>
100      requiredProperties;
101   private Map<String,SchemaInfo> properties;
102   private SchemaInfo additionalProperties;
103
104   /**
105    * Default constructor.
106    */
107   public SchemaInfo() {}
108
109   /**
110    * Copy constructor.
111    *
112    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
113    */
114   public SchemaInfo(SchemaInfo copyFrom) {
115      super(copyFrom);
116
117      this.additionalProperties = copyFrom.additionalProperties == null ? null : copyFrom.additionalProperties.copy();
118      this.allOf = copyOf(copyFrom.allOf);
119      this._default = copyFrom._default;
120      this.description = copyFrom.description;
121      this.discriminator = copyFrom.discriminator;
122      this._enum = copyOf(copyFrom._enum);
123      this.example = copyFrom.example;
124      this.exclusiveMaximum = copyFrom.exclusiveMaximum;
125      this.exclusiveMinimum = copyFrom.exclusiveMinimum;
126      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs == null ? null : copyFrom.externalDocs.copy();
127      this.format = copyFrom.format;
128      this.items = copyFrom.items == null ? null : copyFrom.items.copy();
129      this.maximum = copyFrom.maximum;
130      this.maxItems = copyFrom.maxItems;
131      this.maxLength = copyFrom.maxLength;
132      this.maxProperties = copyFrom.maxProperties;
133      this.minimum = copyFrom.minimum;
134      this.minItems = copyFrom.minItems;
135      this.minLength = copyFrom.minLength;
136      this.minProperties = copyFrom.minProperties;
137      this.multipleOf = copyFrom.multipleOf;
138      this.pattern = copyFrom.pattern;
139      this.readOnly = copyFrom.readOnly;
140      this.ref = copyFrom.ref;
141      this.required = copyFrom.required;
142      this.requiredProperties = copyOf(copyFrom.requiredProperties);
143      this.title = copyFrom.title;
144      this.type = copyFrom.type;
145      this.uniqueItems = copyFrom.uniqueItems;
146      this.xml = copyFrom.xml == null ? null : copyFrom.xml.copy();
147      this.properties = copyOf(copyFrom.properties, SchemaInfo::copy);
148   }
149
150   /**
151    * Make a deep copy of this object.
152    *
153    * @return A deep copy of this object.
154    */
155   public SchemaInfo copy() {
156      return new SchemaInfo(this);
157   }
158
159   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
160   // Properties
161   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

163   /**
164    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
165    *
166    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
167    */
168   public SchemaInfo getAdditionalProperties() {
169      return additionalProperties;
170   }
171
172   /**
173    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
174    *
175    * @param value
176    *    The new value for this property.
177    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
178    * @return This object.
179    */
180   public SchemaInfo setAdditionalProperties(SchemaInfo value) {
181      additionalProperties = value;
182      return this;
183   }
184
185   /**
186    * Bean property getter:  <property>allOf</property>.
187    *

189    */
190   public Set<Object> getAllOf() {
191      return allOf;
192   }
193
194   /**
195    * Bean property setter:  <property>allOf</property>.
196    *
197    * @param value
198    *    The new value for this property.
199    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
200    * @return This object.
201    */
202   public SchemaInfo setAllOf(Collection<Object> value) {
203      allOf = setFrom(value);
204      return this;
205   }
206
207   /**
208    * Bean property appender:  <property>allOf</property>.
209    *
210    * @param values
211    *    The values to add to this property.
212    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
213    * @return This object.
214    */
215   public SchemaInfo addAllOf(Object...values) {
216      allOf = setBuilder(allOf).sparse().add(values).build();
217      return this;
218   }
219
220   /**
221    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>allOf</property>.
222    *
223    * @param value
224    *    The new value for this property.
225    *    <br>Strings can contains JSON arrays.
226    *    <br>Valid types:
227    * @return This object.
228    */
229   public SchemaInfo setAllOf(Object...value) {
230      setAllOf(setBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
231      return this;
232   }

243      return _default;

458    *    <br>Formats defined by the OAS include:
459    *    <ul>
460    *       <li><js>"int32"</js>
461    *       <li><js>"int64"</js>
462    *       <li><js>"float"</js>
463    *       <li><js>"double"</js>
464    *       <li><js>"byte"</js>
465    *       <li><js>"binary"</js>
466    *       <li><js>"date"</js>
467    *       <li><js>"date-time"</js>
468    *       <li><js>"password"</js>
469    *    </ul>
470    * @return This object.
471    */

729   /**

731    *

734    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
735    * @return This object.
736    */
737   public SchemaInfo setProperties(Map<String,SchemaInfo> value) {
738      properties = copyOf(value);
739      return this;
740   }
741
742   /**
743    * Bean property appender:  <property>properties</property>.
744    *
745    * @param key The property key.
746    * @param value The property value.
747    * @return This object.
748    */
749   public SchemaInfo addProperty(String key, SchemaInfo value) {
750      properties = mapBuilder(properties).sparse().add(key, value).build();
751      return this;
752   }

983   // <FluentSetters>
984
985   // </FluentSetters>
986
987   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
988   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
989      if (property == null)
990         return null;
991      return switch (property) {  // NOSONAR
992         case "additionalProperties" -> toType(getAdditionalProperties(), type);
993         case "allOf" -> toType(getAllOf(), type);
994         case "default" -> toType(getDefault(), type);
995         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
996         case "discriminator" -> toType(getDiscriminator(), type);
997         case "enum" -> toType(getEnum(), type);
998         case "example" -> toType(getExample(), type);
999         case "exclusiveMaximum" -> toType(getExclusiveMaximum(), type);
1000         case "exclusiveMinimum" -> toType(getExclusiveMinimum(), type);
1001         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
1002         case "format" -> toType(getFormat(), type);
1003         case "items" -> toType(getItems(), type);
1004         case "maximum" -> toType(getMaximum(), type);
1005         case "maxItems" -> toType(getMaxItems(), type);
1006         case "maxLength" -> toType(getMaxLength(), type);
1007         case "maxProperties" -> toType(getMaxProperties(), type);
1008         case "minimum" -> toType(getMinimum(), type);
1009         case "minItems" -> toType(getMinItems(), type);
1010         case "minLength" -> toType(getMinLength(), type);
1011         case "minProperties" -> toType(getMinProperties(), type);
1012         case "multipleOf" -> toType(getMultipleOf(), type);
1013         case "pattern" -> toType(getPattern(), type);
1014         case "properties" -> toType(getProperties(), type);
1015         case "readOnly" -> toType(getReadOnly(), type);
1016         case "$ref" -> toType(getRef(), type);
1017         case "rquired" -> toType(getRequired(), type);
1018         case "requiredProperties" -> toType(getRequiredProperties(), type);
1019         case "title" -> toType(getTitle(), type);
1020         case "type" -> toType(getType(), type);
1021         case "uniqueItems" -> toType(getUniqueItems(), type);
1022         case "xml" -> toType(getXml(), type);
1023         default -> super.get(property, type);
1024      };
1025   }
1026
1027   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
1028   public SchemaInfo set(String property, Object value) {
1029      if (property == null)
1030         return this;
1031      return switch (property) {  // NOSONAR
1032         case "additionalProperties" -> setAdditionalProperties(toType(value, SchemaInfo.class));
1033         case "allOf" -> setAllOf(value);
1034         case "default" -> setDefault(value);
1035         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
1036         case "discriminator" -> setDiscriminator(Utils.s(value));
1037         case "enum" -> setEnum(value);
1038         case "example" -> setExample(value);
1039         case "exclusiveMaximum" -> setExclusiveMaximum(toBoolean(value));
1040         case "exclusiveMinimum" -> setExclusiveMinimum(toBoolean(value));
1041         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
1042         case "format" -> setFormat(Utils.s(value));
1043         case "items" -> setItems(toType(value, Items.class));
1044         case "maximum" -> setMaximum(toNumber(value));
1045         case "maxItems" -> setMaxItems(toInteger(value));
1046         case "maxLength" -> setMaxLength(toInteger(value));
1047         case "maxProperties" -> setMaxProperties(toInteger(value));
1048         case "minimum" -> setMinimum(toNumber(value));
1049         case "minItems" -> setMinItems(toInteger(value));
1050         case "minLength" -> setMinLength(toInteger(value));
1051         case "minProperties" -> setMinProperties(toInteger(value));
1052         case "multipleOf" -> setMultipleOf(toNumber(value));
1053         case "pattern" -> setPattern(Utils.s(value));
1054         case "properties" -> setProperties(mapBuilder(String.class,SchemaInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1055         case "readOnly" -> setReadOnly(toBoolean(value));
1056         case "$ref" -> setRef(Utils.s(value));
1057         case "required" -> setRequired(toBoolean(value));
1058         case "requiredProperties" -> setRequiredProperties(listBuilder(String.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1059         case "title" -> setTitle(Utils.s(value));
1060         case "type" -> setType(Utils.s(value));
1061         case "uniqueItems" -> setUniqueItems(toBoolean(value));
1062         case "xml" -> setXml(toType(value, Xml.class));
1063         default -> {
1064            super.set(property, value);
1065            yield this;
1066         }
1067      };
1068   }
1069
1070   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
1071   public Set<String> keySet() {
1072      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
1073         .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
1074         .addIf(allOf != null, "allOf")
1075         .addIf(_default != null, "default")
1076         .addIf(description != null, "description")
1077         .addIf(discriminator != null, "discriminator")
1078         .addIf(_enum != null, "enum")
1079         .addIf(example != null, "example")
1080         .addIf(exclusiveMaximum != null, "exclusiveMaximum")
1081         .addIf(exclusiveMinimum != null, "exclusiveMinimum")
1082         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
1083         .addIf(format != null, "format")
1084         .addIf(items != null, "items")
1085         .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
1086         .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
1087         .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
1088         .addIf(maxProperties != null, "maxProperties")
1089         .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
1090         .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
1091         .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
1092         .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties")
1093         .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
1094         .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
1095         .addIf(properties != null, "properties")
1096         .addIf(readOnly != null, "readOnly")
1097         .addIf(ref != null, "$ref")
1098         .addIf(required != null, "required")
1099         .addIf(requiredProperties != null, "requiredProperties")
1100         .addIf(title != null, "title")
1101         .addIf(type != null, "type")
1102         .addIf(uniqueItems != null, "uniqueItems")
1103         .addIf(xml != null, "xml")
1104         .build();
1105      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
1106   }
1107
1108   /**
1109    * Resolves any <js>"$ref"</js> attributes in this element.
1110    *
1111    * @param swagger The swagger document containing the definitions.
1112    * @param refStack Keeps track of previously-visited references so that we don't cause recursive loops.
1113    * @param maxDepth
1114    *    The maximum depth to resolve references.
1115    *    <br>After that level is reached, <c>$ref</c> references will be left alone.
1116    *    <br>Useful if you have very complex models and you don't want your swagger page to be overly-complex.
1117    * @return
1118    *    This object with references resolved.
1119    *    <br>May or may not be the same object.
1120    */
1121   public SchemaInfo resolveRefs(Swagger swagger, Deque<String> refStack, int maxDepth) {
1122
1123      if (ref != null) {
1124         if (refStack.contains(ref) || refStack.size() >= maxDepth)
1125            return this;
1126         refStack.addLast(ref);
1127         var r = swagger.findRef(ref, SchemaInfo.class).resolveRefs(swagger, refStack, maxDepth);
1128         refStack.removeLast();
1129         return r;
1130      }
1131
1132      if (items != null)
1133         items = items.resolveRefs(swagger, refStack, maxDepth);
1134
1135      if (properties != null)
1136         properties.entrySet().forEach(x -> x.setValue(x.getValue().resolveRefs(swagger, refStack, maxDepth)));
1137
1138      if (additionalProperties != null)
1139         additionalProperties = additionalProperties.resolveRefs(swagger, refStack, maxDepth);
1140
1141      this.example = null;
1142
1143      return this;
1144   }
1145}
